name: BATTOJUTSU
description:
Let's enjoy playing the game "BATTOJUTSU" with your Family and Your Good Friends.
Let's aim for Number 1 at Online Battle Mode.
 
■ About BATTOJUTSU
1.Simple Fighting Game.
2.Player need to push buttons faster than the other players.
3.Player can choose 3 difficulty level and Player can play  easy.
 
■Solo Play Mode
Player can play Normal Battle Mode and Straight Battle Mode.
 
■Multi Play Mode
Player can play First Come Battle Mode and Tournament Battle Mode.
Up to 8 people can play Multi Player Mode.
Up to 10 people can play Online Battle Mode.
 
■This Game Sales Point
1.Player can feel traditional Japanese Samurai Culture in this game.
2.Player can play this game easy.
3.Player can play up to 8 people when you choose Multi Player Mode.
4.Player can play up to 10 people when you choose Online Battle Mode.
5.Player can choose 8 Strange & Cute Characters.
 
■Operations Manual
1.You need to push same button with Game Command quickly.
2.When you see "BATTO" Command, you need to shake with  Joy-Con™.
3.When you made false start before open correct command, it's your loss.
